headline: SBA Communications raises annual revenue forecast on robust wireless carrier activity
summary: Mobile network operators have increased investments in cell towers as they ramp up 5G and network infrastructure to capitalize on growing mobile demand, benefiting SBA.  "New U.S. leasing business signed up during the quarter was ahead of our expectations and benefited from continued high levels of new colocations," said CEO Brendan Cavanagh.  SBA is seeing new U.S. leasing business coming more from new lease agreements than from the modification of existing leases.

headline: AT&T Surges 46.8% in a Year: Should T Stock Be in Your Portfolio?
summary: With 243K fiber adds in the second quarter and a 46.8% surge, T is charging ahead, yet market saturation and stiff competition could test its momentum.

raw.headline: AT&T Surges 46.8% in a Year: Should T Stock Be in Your Portfolio?
raw.summary: With 243K fiber adds in the second quarter and a 46.8% surge, T is charging ahead, yet market saturation and stiff competition could test its momentum.

headline: Verizon Gears Up for Back-to-School with a Weekend of Savings, Expert Advice & Essential Tech for Families
summary: Visit any Verizon store for free devices, discounts, and digital wellness toolsNEW YORK, Aug. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As families prepare for the new school year, Verizon is launching a month of unmatched value and digital wellness support, kicking off with Verizon Family Weekend on August 9-10.
